mapper.select:
SELECT FAT_STND_VER , FAT_STND_NO , FAT_STND_NO AS FAT_STND_NO_TEMP , SEX_CD , AGE_YCNT , AGE_MCNT , P5_FIDX , P50_FIDX , P95_FIDX , REG_DT , REG_TM , REG_USER_ID , UPT_DT , UPT_TM , UPT_USER_ID FROM TI_FAT_STND WHERE 1 = 1
AND FAT_STND_VER LIKE CONCAT('%',#{fatStndVer},'%')
AND FAT_STND_NO = #{fatStndNo}::NUMERIC ORDER BY FAT_STND_VER, FAT_STND_NO
LIMIT ${rowCount} OFFSET ${currentIndex}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TI_FAT_STND ( FAT_STND_VER , FAT_STND_NO , SEX_CD , AGE_YCNT , AGE_MCNT , P5_FIDX , P50_FIDX , P95_FIDX , REG_DT , REG_TM , REG_USER_ID , UPT_DT , UPT_TM , UPT_USER_ID ) VALUES ( #{fatStndVer} , #{fatStndNo}::NUMERIC , #{sexCd} , #{ageYcnt}::NUMERIC , #{ageMcnt}::NUMERIC , #{p5Fidx}::NUMERIC , #{p50Fidx}::NUMERIC , #{p95Fidx}::NUMERIC , TO_CHAR(NOW(), 'YYYYMMDD') , TO_CHAR(NOW(), 'HH24MISS') , #{regUserId} , TO_CHAR(NOW(), 'YYYYMMDD') , TO_CHAR(NOW(), 'HH24MISS') , #{uptUserId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE TI_FAT_STND SET UPT_DT = TO_CHAR(NOW(), 'YYYYMMDD') , UPT_TM = TO_CHAR(NOW(),'HH24MISS') , UPT_USER_ID = #{uptUserId} ,FAT_STND_VER = #{fatStndVer} ,FAT_STND_NO = #{fatStndNo}::NUMERIC , SEX_CD = #{sexCd} , AGE_YCNT = #{ageYcnt}::NUMERIC , AGE_MCNT = #{ageMcnt}::NUMERIC , P5_FIDX = #{p5Fidx}::NUMERIC , P50_FIDX = #{p50Fidx}::NUMERIC , P95_FIDX = #{p95Fidx}::NUMERIC WHERE FAT_STND_NO = #{fatStndNoTemp}::NUMERIC
